metadata.title: CVE-2022-4909 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in XML in Google Chrome prior to 107.0.5304.62allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform an ASLR bypass via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
